Name: Kick the VIRUS
About the game: Virus is a man in which you can throw knives and shoot. During the game you can earn more points for which you can buy more powerful weapons. You can also buy items for the virus for the money you earn. If you're tired of sitting at home, you're nervous -Kick the VIRUS. Features: - Earning money - Buying weapons - Buying items for the virus - Heavy Metal Music
